# Worked Examples from tests/

Open:
- d:\0Programmes\Ashrae\si-builder\tests\

Highlights
- Connections: test_connection-001.py … -010.py
- Create from YAML: test_create_from_yaml-001.py … -004.py
- Junctions: test_junction-001.py … -005.py
- Systems: test_system-001.py … -007.py
- Sensors: test_sensor-001.py, -002.py
- Properties: test_property-001.py
- References: test_internal_reference.py, test_external_reference.py
- Media/Enums/Devices: test_media.py, test_enum.py, test_device-*.py

Tips
- Start with test_create_from_yaml-001.py to see a minimal config load.
- Mirror the patterns exactly; then extend gradually.
